com.hpe.caf.worker.document.model

Interface Task

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DocumentWorkerObject

    public interface Task
extends DocumentWorkerObject
    Represents the document processing task.

    The task includes a document or a partial document to be processed, as well as some custom data which may include processing instructions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCustomData(String dataKey)
      Used to retrieve any custom data that was sent with the task.
      Document getDocument()
      Returns the document to be processed by this task.
      Response getResponse()
      Returns an object which can be used to customise the response to the document processing task.
      Scripts getScripts()
      Gets the list of customization scripts associated with this task.
      <S> S getService(Class<S> service)
      Returns the specified task-level service, or null if the service has not been registered.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hpe.caf.worker.document.model.DocumentWorkerObject

        getApplication

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomData

        String getCustomData(String dataKey)
        Used to retrieve any custom data that was sent with the task. The custom data could be used to send processing instructions to the worker, to affect how the document is processed.
        Parameters:
        dataKey - the key of the data to be retrieved (note that the key lookup is case-sensitive)
        Returns:
        the value retrieved if it was sent, or null if no data was sent with the specified key

      • getDocument

        @Nonnull
Document getDocument()
        Returns the document to be processed by this task.
        Returns:
        the document to be processed by this task

      • getScripts

        @Nonnull
Scripts getScripts()
        Gets the list of customization scripts associated with this task.

        Scripts are ordered and can be accessed by index.

        Returns:
        an object which can be used to access the list of scripts

      • getService

        <S> S getService(Class<S> service)
        Returns the specified task-level service, or null if the service has not been registered.

        This method can be used to access task-level services that are provided by the underlying Worker Framework but not exposed by the Document Worker Framework.

        For example, to access the Worker Framework WorkerTaskData object add the following dependency to the project POM: 

          <dependency>
      <groupId>com.github.workerframework</groupId>
      <artifactId>worker-api</artifactId>
      <scope>provided</scope>
  </dependency>
        and then retrieve the object using this method: 
          WorkerTaskData workerTask = documentTask.getService(WorkerTaskData.class);
        Type Parameters:
        S - the type of the service to be returned
        Parameters:
        service - the interface or abstract class representing the service
        Returns:
        the service provider
        See Also:
        Application.getService()

      • getResponse

        @Nonnull
Response getResponse()
        Returns an object which can be used to customise the response to the document processing task.
        Returns:
        the response customization object for this task
